metadata.title: CVE-2014-3877 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Incomplete blacklist vulnerability in Frams' Fast File EXchange (F*EX, akafex) before fex-20140530 allows remote attackers to conduct cross-sitescripting (XSS) attacks via the addto parameter to fup.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3877` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fex - 20140530-1
fex-utils - 20140530-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fex package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20140530-1').
